title: Kasai Gaming Toxicity
body: Recently during a game of ranked solo i came across a player named --snip-- and it was a bot that was there to promote an Elo Boosting site linked above

replies.body: Hey, thanks for the report!  I've edited out the name for security reasons, but report this over to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with more details of what was being prompted.  Our PB team can check it out!
